name: The Early Childhood Development Program
description: An education program that fosters readiness for Kindergarten. The goal is to engage children at a critical stage in their development and provide the foundation for success and achievement later in life.
fullDescription: An education program that fosters readiness for Kindergarten. The goal is to engage children at a critical stage in their development and provide the foundation for success and achievement later in life.
whatTheyOffer: An education program that fosters readiness for Kindergarten. The goal is to engage children at a critical stage in their development and provide the foundation for success and achievement later in life.
howToGetIt: Request application or for more information use ONLINE Form Interested parent(s) will fill out and complete an application form and submit paycheck stubs from two recent months for the verification of income eligibility. The Office Manager will check the returned application to ensure the form has been completed with the necessary information.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale with verified income requirements.
